title: Kate Ritchie appears strained as she's seen for the first time since being granted an interim AVO
text:
Kate Ritchie was spotted at Sydney Domestic Airport on Sunday.

The 41-year-old appeared strained as she arrived fresh off a flight from Brisbane, after news that she has been granted an interim AVO against husband Stuart Webb.

The former Home and Away star, wearing a loose, oversized striped shirt, at one stage lifted to her hand to her face as if upset.

Former Home and Away star Kate Ritchie appeared strained at Sydney Airport on Sunday, as she was seen for the first time since being granted an interim AVO against husband Stuart Webb

Holding a mobile phone, the actress removed her sunglasses inside the terminal.

With a tense expression, Kate, who wore black skinny jeans, walked around the airport holding a black backpack.

She was helped by an assistant who was carrying a large garment bag for her.

The former Home and Away star, wearing a loose, oversized pink, striped shirt, at one stage lifted to her hand to her face as if upset

Support: She was helped by an assistant outside the airport

Wearing a natural makeup palette, her hair in a neat ponytail, Kate appeared to have on multiple rings.

It comes after news that Kate has been granted an interim apprehended violence order (AVO) against husband-of-nine-years Stuart Webb, 39.

New South Wales criminal court records show the former Home And Away star's full name - Katherine Leigh Webb - on the court listing.

The matter between the married couple will be heard at Waverley Court on Thursday, October 24.

Helping hand: Kate and her assistant were carrying a large garment bag, presumably her dress from the ACRAS in Brisbane that she attended at the weekend

Is everything okay? The 41-year-old appeared tense on the day

The listing states the AVO is being taken out by a Constable Dean Hodges on behalf of Katherine Leigh Ritchie against Stuart Broughton Webb.

A NSW Police spokesman confirmed to The Daily Telegraph that they were 'investigating an incident at a home in Randwick on Thursday'.

They added the investigation was ongoing, but no charges had been laid.

Daily Mail Australia has reached out to Kate Ritchie for comment.
description: Kate Ritchie was spotted at Sydney Domestic Airport on Sunday.
